amendatorysection.catchline: Entry of judgment by court; when required.
amendatorysection.para: Where the verdict is special, or where there has been a special finding on particular questions of fact, or where the court has ordered the case to be reserved, it shall order what judgment shall be entered.

annotation.para: Special circumstances of case required trial court to order what judgment should be entered. Bell v. Crook, 168 Neb. 685, 97 N.W.2d 352 (1959).
